dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: In a world where magic has disappeared, the land is ruled by a powerful tyrant.

dialogues.speaker: Protagonist (Eira)
dialogues.text: I've heard rumors of a rebellion forming in the east. I must find out more.

dialogues.speaker: Rebel Leader (Arin)
dialogues.text: Welcome, Eira. We've been expecting you. Our scouts have told us of your... particular skills.

dialogues.speaker: Eira
dialogues.text: What do you plan to do against the tyrant's armies? They are numerous and well-equipped.

dialogues.speaker: Arin
dialogues.text: We have a secret ally who has promised us aid. But for now, let us focus on gathering our forces.
